i just realized i haven't posted since june.
and i could go on about what has happened.
but what do you care?

i'm in a good place and am happy. for now.
thats all you really wanted to know, right?

Part Passionate Kisser

For you, kissing is about all about following your urges If someone's hot, you'll go in for the kiss - end of story You can keep any relationship hot with your steamy kisses A total spark plug - your kisses are bound to get you in trouble

Part Expert Kisser

You're a kissing pro, but it's all about quality and not quantity You've perfected your kissing technique and can knock anyone's socks off And you're adaptable, giving each partner what they crave When it comes down to it, your kisses are truly unforgettable
What Kind of Kisser Are You?
Don't you just wanna kiss me now?

What is your full name: Stephanie Marie 1.What color pants are you wearing? blue 2. What are you listening to right now? movie in the background 3. What's the last thing you ate? fudge 4. Who is your current crush? hmmm, mike from the bank... 5. Do you wish on stars? of course 6. If you were a crayon, what color would you be? hot pink or deep purple 7. How is the weather right now? it was rainy, but now it's dark out, so i dunno 8. Last person you talked to on the phone? on my cell phone-let's see, surprisingly, kyle...house phone, dunno...work phone, my sister 9. Do you like the person who sent you this? nobody sent it to me 10. How are you today? kinda tired 11. Favorite drink? FRESCA!!!!!! Yoohoo's good too 13. Favorite sport? to play? basketball 14. Hair color? blonde! 15. Eye color? blue 16. Do you wear contacts? yes 17. Siblings? 2 sisters, one older, one younger 18. Favorite months? january (my bday month), september...july, cause 4th of july 19. Favorite food? mexican and italian 20. Last movie you watched? shallow hal's on tv right now 21. Favorite day of the year? my birthday, of course! 22. What do you do to vent anger? cry or yell 23. What was your favorite toy as a child? i don't remember, i played in the sandbox a lot...played a lot outside 24. Drink or smoke? more drink than smoke 25. Hugs or Kisses? Hugs are great, cause they're universal and can have lotsa different meanings 26. Chocolate or Vanilla? chocolate 30. Living arrangements? still in hereford with parents adn my little sister 31. When was the last time you cried? tuesday 32. What is under your bed? bunch of Cosmos and some stray socks, i bet 33. Who is a friend you had the longest? my other half, emily, i've known her for, shit, 12 years. 34. What did you do last night? watched the season finale of The O.C. and made some fudge 35. Favorite smells? cinnamon, honeysuckle, Romance by Ralph Lauren, Aqua DiGio by Armani, Very Sexy 1&2 by Victoria's Secret....used to lovelove PoloSport but it reminds me of Matt, so I ..dont..yah...the smell of the ocean... 36. What inspires you? when someone does someting for what they believe in..the march for woman's lives totally inspired me last year 37. What scares you? not knowing about the future 38. Plain, Buttered or Salted Popcorn? buttered 39. Favorite car? i like matt howard's car a lot...when i was little i loved neons, for whatever reason...now i want one of those hybrid cars that are good on gas and good for the environment...yeah i hate SUVs 40. Favorit Flower? pink roses are beautiful, but i would love any kind of flowers, they're so nice to get 41. Number of keys on your key ring? i have 4 seperate keyrings with a key on each, dont ask me why 42. Can you juggle? um, for like 12 seconds 43. Favorite day of the week? sunday cause i have off! 44. What did you do on your last birthday? i really don't remember, it was probably with emily or my sister, and i'm sorry that i forget, it's all the drugs....but i do remember that for my last 2 birthdays, my bfs at the time didnt get me anything....what's a girl gotta do? LAST PERSON WHO: -Slept in your bed: me -Saw you cry: my family at the funeral -Made you cry: my great-grandfather dying -Made you laugh: Zach! ahh, that hat -You went to the movies with: cameron! -You went to the mall with: my sisters, actually -You went shopping with: jen, rachel and sarah -Yelled at you: my boss -Sent you an email: like a real email? emily, awhile ago. i use the phone more than email -You kissed: mm, Kyle. Yum. -You hugged: my sister before she left for prom -You slept with: Kyle. Yum again. HAVE YOU EVER...: -Said "I Love You" and meant it?: yes -Gotten in a fight with your pet: um, no, who does that? -Been to California: no, but AJ lives there! -Been to Hawaii: no, but David's stationed there! -Been to Mexico: no, but Manuel's from there! and he promised he'd take me one day, but...then we broke up... -Been to China: no -Been to Canada: no, i wish, you can drink when you're 19 there, hello! -Danced naked: like, in my bedroom -Dreamed something really crazy and then it happened the next day?: no -Wish you were the opposite sex: i wish i could pee standing up -Had an imaginary friend: nope -Do you have a crush on someone: yes, didn't we go over this? -What book are you reading now: um, i'm in the middle of like 8 -Future daughters's name: not sure, nothing whorish -Do you sleep with a stuffed animal: aww, i used to..like a ton Favorite sport to watch: football or baseball -Location: i haven't been enough places to pick one -College plans: u of md, college park..what what! -Piercings/tattoos: ears, twice...i was thinking about a tattoo, but i dont know whati want Boyfriend/Girlfriend: that's complicated...offically single, we'll say that EXTRA STUFF: -Do you do drugs: yes -Do you drink: hell yes! -Who is your best friend: emily -What clothes do you sleep in: tank top usually -Where do you want to get married: somewhere beautiful -Been in Love: yes -Do you drive: yes -Do you have a job: yup, all i do is work -Do you like being around people: most people -Are you for world peace: yes! STUFF: -Have you ever liked someone you had no chance with: haha, oh yeah -Have you ever cried over something someone of the opposite sex did: unfortunately, yes -Do you have a "type" of person you always go after: not really, they all tend to have brown hair though...hmm -Want someone you don't have right now: that's an understatement -Are you lonely right now: hmm, yeah a little -Song thats stuck in your head: Naughty Girl by Beyonce...man i wish i had a hot name like that.. -Do you want to get married: yeah i think so -Do you want kids: i think so, we'll see Favorite: -Room in house: my room, or the basement -Type(s) of music: anything, ska, punk, screamo, hiphop, r&b, country...love it all -Band(s): less than jake, (the original)catch-22, reel big fish now, greenday Color: pink! IN THE LAST 72 HOURS, HAVE YOU...: -Cried: nope -Bought something: haha yes -Gotten sick: no -Sang: yes! to all my new mixed CDs -Wanted to tell someone you loved them: *sigh* yeah.. -Met someone new: sort of, new girl at work...i dont' like new people...dont like girls...dont know if this is going to work! ergh -Missed someone: yes -Hugged someone: yes -Kissed someone: nope
http://sunshinestar24.livejournal.com/2693.html

ok, so I've finally applied to UMD, and I hope they accept me, cause I really like it there. Everytime I go back I like it even more. It's going to be really tough, and I know I'll need massive loans, but I feel like it will be worth it. The thing that sucks is that now that I'm 19, I'm not covered under my dad's insurance. Anyone have any ideas for decent, affordable insurance?

Oh yeah, quick update on my life: I now work full time and am manager at the dry cleaners, in case anyone was wondering. I also currently have mono, as well as and enlarged liver and spleen...i'm guessing that isn't so great.

So what sucks about that is that I'm not allowed to drink any alcohol which means no partying for the Superbowl (go Pats!!). That blows. 

My parents are worried about me having sex. If they only knew...
Well, actually it's probably only my mom, cause my dad's all like, well she's 19. My mom just doesn't want me to repeat her mistakes..? maybe. But I didn't have sex at 16, so I LEARNED from her mistakes. And if she really had any concern over it she would have had that parent-child talk about sex, but nooo. I don't even know where I learned about sex from. Probably the movies, hehe. 

Ahh, yes, my 19th birthday was Monday, January 24th. I've officially started my last year as a teenager. I have to start being responsible now, yikes!

Hope everyone's having a happy, healthy new year!
http://sunshinestar24.livejournal.com/2446.html

my allergies are bothering me and i can't focus..bleh

Things with matt are pretty much ridiculous right now, and if you don't know the back story, i'd rather not go into it on here, call me and I'll fill you in. Right, so I haven't talked to him since fri night, great boyfriend, huh? So I think I'll be breaking up with him. I know that I SHOULD, but I don't WANT to, as pathetic as that sounds. I really wanted to make it work this time. I sent him this big long message about how i was willing to try if he was, but apparently he's not, because he didn't respond. I think that there's something big going on here, but he's shutting me out, so I have no idea what it is or how to help him. I really want to be with him, but I can't keep letting myself be treated this way. I was disscussing the time that a bunch of us were at kyle's with my sister, and even monica noticed. She said, he doesn't treat your sister very well, it's like she's not his girlfriend. And thats when it hit me that he's sweet and caring when we're alone together, but treats me like I'm just some random girl at kyle's.
I'm sorry to bore you with this.

I read something very interesting online last night, at 2am, natch, but it went:
 We ask for advice when we know what has to be done..but won't admit it.

And i think that most of the time, that is true. We don't like to think we have the answers because then that means that we have to do something about things. Some of us aren't capable of that.

ok, enough rambling, i've got shit to do.

dude, so rachel's un grounded, which means we get to party now. Or at least go to EMS after work without checking with her mom. On another note, this:

the kind of chick that can hang out with your
boyfriend's friends and be silly. You don't
care about presents or about going to fancy
placed. Hell, just hang out. You're just happy

You are an SECF--Sober Emotional Constructive Follower. This makes you a hippie. You are passionate about your causes and steadfast in your commitments. Once you've made up your mind, no one can convince you otherwise. Your politics are left-leaning, and your lifestyle choices decidedly temperate and chaste. You do tremendous work when focused, but usually you operate somewhat distracted. You blow hot and cold, and while you normally endeavor on the side of goodness and truth, you have a massive mean streak which is not to be taken lightly. You don't get mad, you get even. Please don't get even with this web site. OK, I'm sorry, maybe I'm being weird, but this sounds so much like me it isn't even funny. I even showed it to two of my friends and they think it's dead on. And I was just called a hippie today...hmm.

hahaha today has been such the great day. I went to Panera Bread with berkley, and we had so much fun with the sunroof open, sarah mclachlan, and messing with boys. that girl is such a trip.
oh and yay! i finally got a picture of Matt, I'll show it to y'all when i see you next. He's so cute! <3<3 I really feel like this is good and going places, and I'm really excited about it. yay for happy steph!
i'm being such a slacker right now. it's not good. but i don't really care. I'm just so happy to be young and feel so alive! it sounds so corny, but oh well.
i defintely can't wait for this summer cause I have a feeling it's going to be spectacular. ugh, only 3 months to go. this saddens me. someone tell me how to make it through the next 3 months without driving myself and everyone else crazy!

i'm out
peace and love
~S~
